article.title: Alloy Surface Awarded Infrared Decoy Delivery Order
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Alloy Surface Company, Aston, Pennsylvania, is being awarded a more than $19 million delivery order for the manufacture of MJU-64/B infrared decoy devices.Â The U.S. Naval Inventory Control Point, Mechanicsburg, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity.
